channel.title: LoginBox
channel.description: i want to make a new loginbox and i have it coded in the client so you don't have to click on login and then you need to type the name and pass but i made it like it's loaded and then directly you can type your username and pass but i got a problem if my client is loaded it just freezes but i don't get an error anywhere here is a pic: [img]http://i.imgur.com/pgntCzV.png[/img]

item.title: LoginBox
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

thanks but i didn’t mean that
i mean like you see the 2 white places
where you need to type your username and password
that is transparant
but i got the answer because white is in stabbingscape transparant
so the solution is to make it 1% darker

Read full topic

item.title: LoginBox
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

well go to your sprites and you should see your clients login box click it once but don’t open it you should see something like
Dimensions #### x $$$$

then go to this website

www.resizepic.com
now upload your picture you want to resize and change the
width: too ####
height: too $$$$

and click next and save the image somewhere

now change the image name too the sprites name you are changing . Once done place the new image into the sprites folder/or where your thing is at.

COMPILE
RUN

~MrFun

Read full topic
